transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Evasion
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Evasion
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Ember, Charge!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
When the caster is granted <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color>, changes to <color=#ffd732>Help Me, Master!</color>.

<color=#ffd732>Help Me, Master!</color>
Attacks an enemy and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Increases damage dealt.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Before attacking, grants Radiant Will for 1 turn

description:
Attacks an enemy, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000094_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
When the caster is granted <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color>, changes to <color=#ffd732>Help Me, Master!</color>.

<color=#ffd732>Help Me, Master!</color>
Attacks an enemy and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000094_1_2] turn(s)</color>. Increases damage dealt.

SKT_SECOND.name: Burning Injustice
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect)\nDamage taken by all enemies increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on them.\nAfter being hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance each to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies  for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: (Passive Effect)\nDamage taken by all enemies increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on them.\nAfter being hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000094_2_1]</color> chance each to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies  for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000094_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Blaze Like a Flame!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Grants <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. After attacking, inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nRight after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
description: Grants <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000094_3_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. After attacking, inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000094_3_3] turn(s)</color>.\nRight after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000094_chain_1_1]</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000094_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000094_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000094_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
